Far North District Council flags at half mast to mark death of long-time councillor Laurie Byers https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-district-council-flags-at-half-mast-to-mark-death-of-long-time-councillor-laurie-拜尔斯/G3Q5KHI3IZEBDBOPFSLY5EX6MM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-district-council-flags-at-half-mast-to-mark-death-of-long-time-councillor-laurie-拜尔斯/G3Q5KHI3IZEBDBOPFSLY5EX6MM/ Long-time Far North District Councillor Laurie Byers dies Tue, 23 Jul 2024 19:55:36 +0000 Sport was a passion for former Olympic and Commonwealth Games cyclist Laurie Byers who was always keen to get kids involved in sport. Byers, a long-time district councillor has died and flags will be at half mast in the Far North to mark his passing.
